summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RPG Habit Tracker PWA iteration 2. Core UI components work excellently with beautiful French localization and modern design. However, the critical data persistence issue from iteration 1 remains unresolved - habits cannot be created or persist in localStorage, blocking the main RPG completion flow.

critical_bugs.issue: Habits cannot be created or don't persist to localStorage - creation dialog works but data doesn't save
critical_bugs.impact: Completely blocks habit completion testing and XP gain functionality

critical_bugs.issue: Settings page only accessible via direct URL, not through bottom navigation
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot access settings through normal navigation flow

integration_issues.issue: No data persists after page refresh - localStorage sync completely broken

passed_tests: Stats page: Radar chart and progress bars with all 6 RPG stats (Force, Endurance, Intelligence, Charisme, Agilité, Sagesse)
History page: Weekly charts ('Cette semaine') and monthly calendar with proper date highlighting
Badges page: All 10 badge levels from Novice (level 10) to Titan (level 80) displayed correctly
Settings page functionality: Theme toggle, wallpaper selection (5 options), custom wallpaper URL input, RPG stat management
XP system display: Level 1, 0/100 XP bar rendering correctly
Navigation: Bottom navigation works between Dashboard, Stats, History, Badges pages
UI/UX: Beautiful glass morphism design, excellent French localization, responsive layout
Habit creation dialog: Form opens, accepts input, validates fields, shows stat linking options
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix the localStorage persistence issue in useRPG hook/RPGContext. Habits are not being saved to localStorage despite the creation dialog working. Also fix Settings page navigation accessibility. The synchronization bug claimed to be fixed is still present and blocking all habit completion testing.

success_percentage.navigation: 80% - Most pages accessible except Settings via nav
success_percentage.rpg_display_system: 95% - Stats, badges, history all display perfectly
success_percentage.habit_system: 10% - Dialog works but no actual functionality
